description: ClickHouse Vector Store with search capabilities

table.info: The name of the table where vectors will be stored

index_type.info: Type of the index (annoy or vector_similarity)

metric.info: Metric to compute distance (angular, euclidean, manhattan, hamming, or dot)

secure.info: Use https/TLS. This overrides inferred values from the interface or port arguments.

index_query_params.info: Additional query parameters for the index

score_threshold.info: Minimum similarity score threshold for search results

success.store_created: Vector store created successfully in table '{table}'

errors.clickhouse_not_installed: Failed to import ClickHouse dependencies. Install it using `uv pip install langflow[clickhouse-connect] --pre`

logs.connecting: Connecting to ClickHouse - Host: {host}, Port: {port}, Database: {database}
logs.settings_configured: Settings configured - Table: {table}, Database: {database}, Index Type: {index_type}, Metric: {metric}
logs.adding_documents: Adding {count} documents to the Vector Store.
logs.creating_from_documents: Creating vector store from {count} documents - Table: {table}
logs.no_documents: No documents to add to the Vector Store.
